Wer dieses Spiel noch nicht gespielt hat, hat was verpasst.
Man muss nicht viel zu diesem Spiel sagen auÃŸer das es von Valve entwickelt wurde und deswegen einfach nur genial ist.
Was Valve in diesem Spiel aus der Source Engine rausgeholt hat ist einfach nur geil.

Die Story ist mit richtig viel Humor gefÃ¼llt. Ich hab sie schon mehrmals durchgespielt und ich find sie immer wieder gut.

Das Spiel enthÃ¤lt einen Level Editor, der mit eine bisschen Mods wirklich was hergibt und viele MÃ¶glichkeiten bietet seine eigenen "Testkammern" zu erstellen.

Paar Monate nachdem ich dieses Spiel von meinem PC deinstalliert habe, wurde es wieder runtergeladen.

Man bekommt immer neue Lust die Testkammern zu meistern.

Eines der besten Spiele aller Zeiten. Wenn nicht das Beste.

Still one of the best puzzle games of all time. The thought that goes into weaving this story around these genuinely challenging puzzles is astonishing. Add in the fact that the graphics hold up even to this date. Desperately hoping a Portal 3 is made at some point, or I'll truely feel as if "The cake is a lie".

Bons grÃ¡ficos, boa historia, bom co-op

What can I say about this game? Its possibly one of the most successful and most popular valve titles to date. One of the reasons this game became so popular is it's cast of quirky and unique characters. The writing and witty humor of Portal 2 made me laugh my ass off the whole way through. As far as gameplay goes, it feels similar to it's predecessor, but with a few new elements for the level designers to work with. The puzzle designs on the first playthrough feel complex at first, yet simple when they are completed. You may find yourself stumbling around until yout find that the answer was simple, and you feel like an idiot. This makes the puzzles challenging, yet satisfying once completed. My only chief complaint is the lack of replay value the game has to offer. Once you complete the main story, you already know how the puzzles are completed, and the sense of challenge is lost. I actually replayed the game just so I could laugh at the characters again. Overall, this game is a must buy, and one of valve's greatest titles.

PROS:
-Great characters and writing
-Challenging yet simple puzzles
-Low Price

CONS:
-Low Replay Value
